query.nsql:
SELECT @SELECT:DIM:USER_DEF:IMPLIED:CODES:SETTING_ID:CODE@, @SELECT:DIM_PROP:USER_DEF:IMPLIED:CODES:LAST_UPDATED_DATE:LAST_UPDATED_DATE@, @SELECT:DIM_PROP:USER_DEF:IMPLIED:CODES:LAST_UPDATED_BY:LAST_UPDATED_BY@ FROM ( SELECT j.setting_id , j.last_updated_date , csu.user_name AS last_updated_by FROM (
-- To convert to SQL replace @NVL@ with NVL (Oracle) ISNULL (MSSQL) -- SESSION OPTIONS (DONE) SELECT 'SEC_BAD_LOGIN_LIMIT' AS setting_id , lj.last_updated_by , lj.last_updated_date FROM dual d LEFT JOIN ( SELECT cmn_options.last_updated_by , cmn_options.last_updated_date FROM cmn_options, cmn_option_values WHERE cmn_options.id = cmn_option_values.option_id AND cmn_options.is_active = 1 AND cmn_options.option_code = 'SEC_BAD_LOGIN_LIMIT' ) lj ON 1=1
UNION ALL
SELECT 'SEC_SESSION_EXPIRATION' AS setting_id , lj.last_updated_by , lj.last_updated_date FROM dual d LEFT JOIN ( SELECT cmn_options.last_updated_by , cmn_options.last_updated_date FROM cmn_options, cmn_option_values WHERE cmn_options.id = cmn_option_values.option_id AND cmn_options.is_active = 1 AND cmn_options.option_code = 'SEC_SESSION_EXPIRATION' ) lj ON 1=1
UNION ALL
-- CHANGE PASSWORD OPTIONS (DONE) SELECT 'SEC_PWD_CHG_DAYS' AS setting_id , lj.last_updated_by , lj.last_updated_date FROM dual d LEFT JOIN ( SELECT cmn_options.last_updated_by , cmn_options.last_updated_date FROM cmn_options, cmn_option_values WHERE cmn_options.id = cmn_option_values.option_id AND cmn_options.is_active = 1 AND cmn_options.option_code = 'SEC_PWD_CHG_DAYS' ) lj ON 1=1
UNION ALL
SELECT 'SEC_PWD_DIFF_FROM_USER' AS setting_id , lj.last_updated_by , lj.last_updated_date FROM dual d LEFT JOIN ( SELECT cmn_options.last_updated_by , cmn_options.last_updated_date FROM cmn_options, cmn_option_values WHERE cmn_options.id = cmn_option_values.option_id AND cmn_options.is_active = 1 AND cmn_options.option_code = 'SEC_PWD_DIFF_FROM_USER' ) lj ON 1=1
UNION ALL
SELECT 'SEC_PWD_HISTORY' AS setting_id , lj.last_updated_by , lj.last_updated_date FROM dual d LEFT JOIN ( SELECT cmn_options.last_updated_by , cmn_options.last_updated_date FROM cmn_options, cmn_option_values WHERE cmn_options.id = cmn_option_values.option_id AND cmn_options.is_active = 1 AND cmn_options.option_code = 'SEC_PWD_HISTORY' ) lj ON 1=1
UNION ALL
SELECT 'SEC_PWD_HISTORY_DAYS' AS setting_id , lj.last_updated_by , lj.last_updated_date FROM dual d LEFT JOIN ( SELECT cmn_options.last_updated_by , cmn_options.last_updated_date FROM cmn_options, cmn_option_values WHERE cmn_options.id = cmn_option_values.option_id AND cmn_options.is_active = 1 AND cmn_options.option_code = 'SEC_PWD_HISTORY_DAYS' ) lj ON 1=1
UNION ALL
SELECT 'SEC_MIN_PASSWORD_LENGTH' AS setting_id , lj.last_updated_by , lj.last_updated_date FROM dual d LEFT JOIN ( SELECT cmn_options.last_updated_by , cmn_options.last_updated_date FROM cmn_options, cmn_option_values WHERE cmn_options.id = cmn_option_values.option_id AND cmn_options.is_active = 1 AND cmn_options.option_code = 'SEC_MIN_PASSWORD_LENGTH' ) lj ON 1=1
UNION ALL
SELECT 'SEC_MIN_UPPERCASE_ENABLE' AS setting_id , lj.last_updated_by , lj.last_updated_date FROM dual d LEFT JOIN ( SELECT cmn_options.last_updated_by , cmn_options.last_updated_date FROM cmn_options, cmn_option_values WHERE cmn_options.id = cmn_option_values.option_id AND cmn_options.is_active = 1 AND cmn_options.option_code = 'SEC_MIN_UPPERCASE_ENABLE' ) lj ON 1=1
UNION ALL
SELECT 'SEC_MIN_UPPERCASE_LENGTH' AS setting_id , lj.last_updated_by , lj.last_updated_date FROM dual d LEFT JOIN ( SELECT cmn_options.last_updated_by , cmn_options.last_updated_date FROM cmn_options, cmn_option_values WHERE cmn_options.id = cmn_option_values.option_id AND cmn_options.is_active = 1 AND cmn_options.option_code = 'SEC_MIN_UPPERCASE_LENGTH' ) lj ON 1=1
UNION ALL
SELECT 'SEC_MIN_LOWERCASE_ENABLE' AS setting_id , lj.last_updated_by , lj.last_updated_date FROM dual d LEFT JOIN ( SELECT cmn_options.last_updated_by , cmn_options.last_updated_date FROM cmn_options, cmn_option_values WHERE cmn_options.id = cmn_option_values.option_id AND cmn_options.is_active = 1 AND cmn_options.option_code = 'SEC_MIN_LOWERCASE_ENABLE' ) lj ON 1=1
UNION ALL
SELECT 'SEC_MIN_LOWERCASE_LENGTH' AS setting_id , lj.last_updated_by , lj.last_updated_date FROM dual d LEFT JOIN ( SELECT cmn_options.last_updated_by , cmn_options.last_updated_date FROM cmn_options, cmn_option_values WHERE cmn_options.id = cmn_option_values.option_id AND cmn_options.is_active = 1 AND cmn_options.option_code = 'SEC_MIN_LOWERCASE_LENGTH' ) lj ON 1=1
UNION ALL
SELECT 'SEC_MIN_NUMERIC_ENABLE' AS setting_id , lj.last_updated_by , lj.last_updated_date FROM dual d LEFT JOIN ( SELECT cmn_options.last_updated_by , cmn_options.last_updated_date FROM cmn_options, cmn_option_values WHERE cmn_options.id = cmn_option_values.option_id AND cmn_options.is_active = 1 AND cmn_options.option_code = 'SEC_MIN_NUMERIC_ENABLE' ) lj ON 1=1
UNION ALL
SELECT 'SEC_MIN_NUMERIC_LENGTH' AS setting_id , lj.last_updated_by , lj.last_updated_date FROM dual d LEFT JOIN ( SELECT cmn_options.last_updated_by , cmn_options.last_updated_date FROM cmn_options, cmn_option_values WHERE cmn_options.id = cmn_option_values.option_id AND cmn_options.is_active = 1 AND cmn_options.option_code = 'SEC_MIN_NUMERIC_LENGTH' ) lj ON 1=1
UNION ALL
SELECT 'SEC_MIN_SPECIAL_ENABLE' AS setting_id , lj.last_updated_by , lj.last_updated_date FROM dual d LEFT JOIN ( SELECT cmn_options.last_updated_by , cmn_options.last_updated_date FROM cmn_options, cmn_option_values WHERE cmn_options.id = cmn_option_values.option_id AND cmn_options.is_active = 1 AND cmn_options.option_code = 'SEC_MIN_SPECIAL_ENABLE' ) lj ON 1=1
UNION ALL
SELECT 'SEC_MIN_SPECIAL_LENGTH' AS setting_id , lj.last_updated_by , lj.last_updated_date FROM dual d LEFT JOIN ( SELECT cmn_options.last_updated_by , cmn_options.last_updated_date FROM cmn_options, cmn_option_values WHERE cmn_options.id = cmn_option_values.option_id AND cmn_options.is_active = 1 AND cmn_options.option_code = 'SEC_MIN_SPECIAL_LENGTH' ) lj ON 1=1
UNION ALL
SELECT 'SEC_PASSWORD_REG_EXPR' AS setting_id , lj.last_updated_by , lj.last_updated_date FROM dual d LEFT JOIN ( SELECT cmn_options.last_updated_by , cmn_options.last_updated_date FROM cmn_options, cmn_option_values WHERE cmn_options.id = cmn_option_values.option_id AND cmn_options.is_active = 1 AND cmn_options.option_code = 'SEC_PASSWORD_REG_EXPR' ) lj ON 1=1
UNION ALL
SELECT 'SEC_PASSWORD_REG_EXPR_ERR_MSG' AS setting_id , lj.last_updated_by , lj.last_updated_date FROM dual d LEFT JOIN ( SELECT cmn_options.last_updated_by , cmn_options.last_updated_date FROM cmn_options, cmn_captions_nls WHERE cmn_options.id = cmn_captions_nls.pk_id AND cmn_captions_nls.table_name = 'CMN_OPTIONS' AND cmn_options.option_code = 'SEC_PASSWORD_REG_EXPR' AND cmn_captions_nls.language_code = 'en' ) lj ON 1=1
UNION ALL
-- DOCUMENT MANAGER OPTIONS (DONE) SELECT 'DMS_EXTENSIONS_ALLOWED' AS setting_id , lj.last_updated_by , lj.last_updated_date FROM dual d LEFT JOIN ( SELECT cmn_options.last_updated_by , cmn_options.last_updated_date FROM cmn_options, cmn_option_values WHERE cmn_options.id = cmn_option_values.option_id AND cmn_options.is_active = 1 AND cmn_options.option_code = 'DMS_EXTENSIONS_ALLOWED' ) lj ON 1=1

SELECT 'DMS_ACCESS_DOCUMENTS_DEFAULT' AS setting_id , lj.last_updated_by , lj.last_updated_date FROM dual d LEFT JOIN ( SELECT cmn_options.last_updated_by , cmn_options.last_updated_date FROM cmn_options, cmn_option_values WHERE cmn_options.id = cmn_option_values.option_id AND cmn_options.is_active = 1 AND cmn_options.option_code = 'DMS_ACCESS_DOCUMENTS_DEFAULT' ) lj ON 1=1
UNION ALL
SELECT 'ENABLE_DMS_DOWNLOAD' AS setting_id , lj.last_updated_by , lj.last_updated_date FROM dual d LEFT JOIN ( SELECT cmn_options.last_updated_by , cmn_options.last_updated_date FROM cmn_options, cmn_option_values WHERE cmn_options.id = cmn_option_values.option_id AND cmn_options.is_active = 1 AND cmn_options.option_code = 'ENABLE_DMS_DOWNLOAD' ) lj ON 1=1
UNION ALL
SELECT 'DMS_DOCUMENT_MAX_SIZE' AS setting_id , lj.last_updated_by , lj.last_updated_date FROM dual d LEFT JOIN ( SELECT cmn_options.last_updated_by , cmn_options.last_updated_date FROM cmn_options, cmn_option_values WHERE cmn_options.id = cmn_option_values.option_id AND cmn_options.is_active = 1 AND cmn_options.option_code = 'DMS_DOCUMENT_MAX_SIZE' ) lj ON 1=1
UNION ALL
SELECT 'DMS_DOCUMENT_WARN_SIZE' AS setting_id , lj.last_updated_by , lj.last_updated_date FROM dual d LEFT JOIN ( SELECT cmn_options.last_updated_by , cmn_options.last_updated_date FROM cmn_options, cmn_option_values WHERE cmn_options.id = cmn_option_values.option_id AND cmn_options.is_active = 1 AND cmn_options.option_code = 'DMS_DOCUMENT_WARN_SIZE' ) lj ON 1=1

-- DATA WAREHOUSE OPTIONS -- TODO: Languages SELECT 'DWH_ENTITY_KEY' AS setting_id , lj.last_updated_by , lj.last_updated_date FROM dual d LEFT JOIN ( SELECT DWHS.last_updated_by , DWHS.last_updated_date FROM DWH_SETTINGS DWHS ) lj ON 1=1
UNION ALL
SELECT 'DWH_WEEKLY_PERIODS' AS setting_id , lj.last_updated_by , lj.last_updated_date FROM dual d LEFT JOIN ( SELECT DWHS.last_updated_by , DWHS.last_updated_date FROM DWH_SETTINGS DWHS ) lj ON 1=1

SELECT 'DWH_MONTHLY_PERIODS' AS setting_id , lj.last_updated_by , lj.last_updated_date FROM dual d LEFT JOIN ( SELECT DWHS.last_updated_by , DWHS.last_updated_date FROM DWH_SETTINGS DWHS ) lj ON 1=1

SELECT 'DWH_FIN_PLANS_POR_ONLY' AS setting_id , lj.last_updated_by , lj.last_updated_date FROM dual d LEFT JOIN ( SELECT DWHS.last_updated_by , DWHS.last_updated_date FROM DWH_SETTINGS DWHS ) lj ON 1=1

-- ADVANCED REPORTING -- TODO: Advanced Reporting Server URL -- TODO: Organization ID -- TODO: Clarity PPM Database Schema -- TODO: Data Warehouse Database Schema SELECT 'JSFT_GRP_ROLE_SYNC' AS setting_id , lj.last_updated_by , lj.last_updated_date FROM dual d LEFT JOIN ( SELECT cmn_options.last_updated_by , cmn_options.last_updated_date FROM cmn_options, cmn_option_values WHERE cmn_options.id = cmn_option_values.option_id AND cmn_options.is_active = 1 AND cmn_options.option_code = 'JSFT_GRP_ROLE_SYNC' ) lj ON 1=1

-- API -- TODO: REST API Status -- TODO: API URL -- TODO: API Documentation URL SELECT 'ACCESS_TOKEN_ENABLED' AS setting_id , lj.last_updated_by , lj.last_updated_date FROM dual d LEFT JOIN ( SELECT cmn_options.last_updated_by , cmn_options.last_updated_date FROM cmn_options, cmn_option_values WHERE cmn_options.id = cmn_option_values.option_id AND cmn_options.is_active = 1 AND cmn_options.option_code = 'ACCESS_TOKEN_ENABLED' ) lj ON 1=1

-- OTHER -- TODO: Chart Colors SELECT 'COMPANY_NAME' AS setting_id , lj.last_updated_by , lj.last_updated_date FROM dual d LEFT JOIN ( SELECT cmn_options.last_updated_by , cmn_options.last_updated_date FROM cmn_options, cmn_option_values WHERE cmn_options.id = cmn_option_values.option_id AND cmn_options.is_active = 1 AND cmn_options.option_code = 'COMPANY_NAME' ) lj ON 1=1

SELECT 'CMN_GZIP_ENCODING' AS setting_id , lj.last_updated_by , lj.last_updated_date FROM dual d LEFT JOIN ( SELECT cmn_options.last_updated_by , cmn_options.last_updated_date FROM cmn_options, cmn_option_values WHERE cmn_options.id = cmn_option_values.option_id AND cmn_options.is_active = 1 AND cmn_options.option_code = 'CMN_GZIP_ENCODING' ) lj ON 1=1

) j JOIN cmn_sec_users csu ON csu.id = j.last_updated_by ) x WHERE @FILTER@
